title: The One With All The Jealousy

questions.question: What does Rachel wear to her first day at her new job?
questions.correct_answer: A towel
questions.explanation: Rachel runs into the living room wearing only a towel.

questions.question: Who helps Rachel pick out a purse for her first day of work?
questions.correct_answer: Phoebe
questions.explanation: Phoebe arrives with about 20 purses hanging around her neck to help Rachel choose one.

questions.question: What is the name of Chandler's weird cousin who is getting married?
questions.correct_answer: Albert
questions.explanation: Chandler mentions that his weird cousin Albert is getting married.

questions.question: What is the name of the song Joey plans to sing at his audition?
options: I Left My Heart in San Francisco
You've Got to Pick a Pocket or Two
questions.correct_answer: You've Got to Pick a Pocket or Two
questions.explanation: Joey sings 'You've Got to Pick a Pocket or Two' during his audition.

questions.question: What is the name of the woman who kisses Mark in Rachel's office?
questions.correct_answer: Another woman at the office
questions.explanation: Mark is seen kissing another woman in Rachel's office.

questions.question: What is the name of the poem Julio writes about?
questions.correct_answer: The Empty Vase
questions.explanation: Monica mentions that Julio wrote a poem called 'The Empty Vase'.

questions.question: What does Ross send to Rachel's office to mark his territory?
questions.correct_answer: Both A and B
questions.explanation: Ross sends both a love bug and a barbershop quartet to Rachel's office.

questions.question: What is the name of the diner where Monica works?
questions.correct_answer: The Moondance Diner
questions.explanation: Monica works at the Moondance Diner.

questions.question: Who does Ross have a play date with at the end of the episode?
options: A stripper he met at a party
questions.correct_answer: A stripper he met at a party
questions.explanation: Ross has a play date with a stripper he met at a party.

questions.question: What does Joey claim to have on his resume?
options: Three years of modern dance with Twila Tharp
Five years with the American Ballet Theater
questions.correct_answer: Both A and B
questions.explanation: Joey claims to have both three years of modern dance with Twila Tharp and five years with the American Ballet Theater on his resume.

questions.question: What does Phoebe think Julio's poem 'The Empty Vase' is really about?
questions.correct_answer: All American women
questions.explanation: Phoebe thinks Julio's poem is really about all American women.

questions.question: What does Monica give to Julio as a gift?
questions.correct_answer: A vase
questions.explanation: Monica gives Julio a vase as a gift.

questions.question: What does Ross do when he sees Mark kissing another woman in Rachel's office?
options: He gets angry and confronts Mark
He gets jealous and tries to mark his territory
He realizes he needs to work on his relationship with Rachel
He storms out of the office
questions.correct_answer: He gets angry and confronts Mark
questions.explanation: Ross gets angry and confronts Mark when he sees him kissing another woman in Rachel's office.

questions.question: What does Joey do during his dance audition?
options: He sings 'I Left My Heart in San Francisco'
He sings 'You've Got to Pick a Pocket or Two' and picks a pocket
He runs out of the audition
questions.correct_answer: He runs out of the audition
questions.explanation: Joey runs out of the audition during his dance audition.

questions.question: What does Rachel do when Ross tells her he has a play date with a stripper?
options: She gets angry and confronts Ross
She becomes jealous and tries to mark her territory
She realizes she needs to work on her relationship with Ross
She gives Ross a passionate kiss
questions.correct_answer: She gives Ross a passionate kiss
questions.explanation: Rachel gives Ross a passionate kiss when he tells her he has a play date with a stripper.

questions.question: What is the reason for Ross's jealousy according to Chandler?
options: Ross is afraid of losing Rachel to Mark
Ross is insecure about his relationship with Rachel
Ross is trying to mark his territory
questions.correct_answer: Ross is afraid of losing Rachel to Mark
questions.explanation: Chandler thinks Ross is jealous because he is afraid of losing Rachel to Mark.

questions.question: What does Gunther say when Ross and Rachel are talking at Central Perk?
questions.correct_answer: Let it be me
questions.explanation: Gunther says 'Let it be me' when Ross and Rachel are talking at Central Perk.

questions.question: What does Monica say to Julio when she finds out what his poem is really about?
options: You have no right to make that kind of judgment about me
questions.correct_answer: You have no right to make that kind of judgment about me
questions.explanation: Monica tells Julio that he has no right to make that kind of judgment about her.

questions.question: What does the barbershop quartet sing to Julio at the end of the episode?
questions.correct_answer: You're a buttmunch and you're bad in bed
questions.explanation: The barbershop quartet sings that Julio is a buttmunch and bad in bed.

questions.question: What is the name of the song the pianist plays during Joey's dance audition?
options: You've Got to Pick a Pocket or Two
I Left My Heart in San Francisco
questions.correct_answer: Not specified
questions.explanation: The song the pianist plays during Joey's dance audition is not specified.

questions.question: What does Chandler buy for the bachelor party?
options: A pen with a naked woman
questions.correct_answer: A stripper and a pen with a naked woman
questions.explanation: Chandler buys a stripper and a pen with a naked woman for the bachelor party.

questions.question: What does Ross do when he sees Mark kissing another woman in Rachel's office?
options: He gets angry and confronts Mark
He throws the love bug at Mark
He storms out of the office
He tries to mark his territory
questions.correct_answer: He throws the love bug at Mark
questions.explanation: Ross throws the love bug at Mark when he sees him kissing another woman in Rachel's office.

questions.question: What does Joey do when he is asked to teach the dance combination to the other dancers?
options: He runs out of the audition
He sings 'You've Got to Pick a Pocket or Two'
questions.correct_answer: He runs out of the audition
questions.explanation: Joey runs out of the audition when he is asked to teach the dance combination to the other dancers.

questions.question: What is the reason for Monica's confrontation with Julio?
options: She thinks he is a great poet
She thinks he is a buttmunch
She thinks his poem is about her
questions.correct_answer: She thinks his poem is about her
questions.explanation: Monica confronts Julio because she thinks his poem is about her.

questions.question: What does Phoebe think about Julio's poem?
questions.correct_answer: It's about all American women
questions.explanation: Phoebe thinks Julio's poem is about all American women.

questions.question: What does Ross say to Rachel when she asks him why he is jealous?
options: I'm afraid of losing you to Mark
I'm trying to mark my territory
I love you more than I loved Carol
questions.correct_answer: I love you more than I loved Carol
questions.explanation: Ross tells Rachel that he loves her more than he loved Carol.

questions.question: What does Chandler say to Ross when he is trying to decide what to do about Rachel and Mark?
options: You should send her a love bug
You should try to mark your territory
You should go to her office and surprise her
questions.correct_answer: You should go to her office and surprise her
questions.explanation: Chandler suggests that Ross should go to Rachel's office and surprise her.

questions.question: What does Joey say to the director when he is asked to teach the dance combination?
options: I'd be happy to teach it
It's step-ity, step and jazz hands
questions.correct_answer: It's step-ity, step and jazz hands
questions.explanation: Joey says 'It's step-ity, step and jazz hands' when he is asked to teach the dance combination.

questions.question: What does Monica say to Julio when she gives him the vase?
options: I think your poem is about me
questions.correct_answer: I think your poem is about me
questions.explanation: Monica tells Julio that she thinks his poem is about her.

questions.question: What does the director say to Joey when he asks him to teach the dance combination?
options: You have a lot of experience
You have to teach the combination to the other dancers
questions.correct_answer: You have to teach the combination to the other dancers
questions.explanation: The director asks Joey to teach the dance combination to the other dancers.

questions.question: What does Ross do when he sees the woman Mark is kissing?
options: He gets angry and confronts Mark
He storms out of the office
He throws the love bug at Mark
questions.correct_answer: He realizes it's not Rachel
questions.explanation: Ross realizes that the woman Mark is kissing is not Rachel.
